sourcesContent:
<template>
  <n-form>
        <n-form-item>
          <n-input v-model:value="advice.original" maxlength="500" show-count type="textarea" placeholder="请将原文内容复制粘贴到这里...（800字以内）" :autosize="{minRows:3,maxRows:12}" clearable/>
        </n-form-item>
    <n-button v-show="false" @click="getAdvices" type="info" size="large">确定</n-button>
  </n-form>
</template>

<script setup>
import {NForm, NFormItem, NInput, NButton} from 'naive-ui';
import {ref,defineEmits,defineExpose} from 'vue';

const advice = ref({});
const emit = defineEmits(['adviceMessage'])
const getAdvices = ()=>{
    console.log(advice.value);
    emit('adviceMessage',advice.value);
    }

defineExpose({getAdvices});
</script>
